sentences.sContent: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
...Too many workplace policies effectively prohibit employees from developing a healthy work-life balance by barring them from taking time off...
...the municipal government also plans to build a number of water-recycling plants and to prohibit illegal constructions...

remMethod.val: pro(提前) ＋ hibit(拿住) → 提前拿住 → 禁止， 不准

words.tran: 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的
禁止；禁令；禁酒；诉讼中止令

trans.tranOther: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed
